name: Ice Break
description:
Ice Break is the brilliant new physics puzzler from the developer who brought you Mr Word, The Music Game and Radio Cloud.

Can you save all the green ice blocks whilst smashing all the red ones? Sound simple? You won't be saying that after attempting all 48 free levels (no in-app purchase required!)

The levels get increasingly trickier with things like ropes, joints and rolling balls of ice to contend with.

Guaranteed to give you brain freeze before you're done.
